Probably because this one should really return true or false as it's the object used everywhere :)
(such as in nuxeo/nuxeo-web-ui#973)

replies.bodyText: Yes. I need a single point in which to determine the semantics of a null value. Plan is for it to be false in master (repos are not headless by default) but for it to be true when null and not the default repo in 10.10 so that the repository picker is not suddenly shown.
